duties_responsibilities.duty: Install and set up networking, IP cameras, structured cabling, access control, and audio video distribution over IP systems.
Utilize strong customer relationship skills to effectively interact with clients and address their needs.
Provide turn-key installation solutions, from running cables to setting up hardware and systems.
Demonstrate strong initiative by taking proactive steps to solve challenges and address client requirements.
Troubleshoot and resolve complex issues related to hardware installation and system setup.

education_certification.credential: Relevant technical certification or equivalent experience in low voltage or network installation.
